content: write a line erase a line is an ode to the music of the decemberists and to the epic story of joan of arc who sat in her garden and received the visions that inspired her to change her world **techniques** basic stitches puff stitches decrease dc3tog stitch descriptions are provided **yarn** you will need approximately 950 yards of sport weight yarn the sample used purl soho s good wool in the color hay field **hook** size h/5 0mm or size needed to achieve gauge and a beautiful drape optional **beads** this pattern uses 496 2/0 seed beads in a color that contrasts against the yarn if you choose to use them pre-stringing is necessary if you don t want to use them simply ignore the directions to pre-string the beads and work the pattern as written **notions** tapestry needle scissors as always feel free to contact me with any questions happy crafting
